body: GUO.X, Everything is working on my end and the error does not seem to be the result of the curved geometry: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/WhXvjRSMgSUxRVIl9IcsSq5xkK4BNf-eHG*j1Q4pSgbaK2QTZoQ1F-HS1ldVzgxPZ7Myjre4ZdSsEWdHD-0RNMLn8X3YCSUm/CurvedTest.JPG) Are you still able to get the issue when you reopen the file or you update your components? -Chris
